1222.content:
I decide Kayla is a good option. She's closer and I'm sure she will help me. I've seen Cindy crush bugs without hesitation and the thought of her treating me like one makes me shiver. I don't know Kayla that well but I'm willing to take a risk. I reluctantly walk past a pair of black flats in front of her outstretched left foot. Just the sheer size of them are flat out intimidating to me. I would never be able to escape in time if they were descending upon me, no matter how fast I ran.

After making it past the shoes, I watch as Kayla keeps her nearest foot, the left one outstretched but moves her right foot back as she bends her knee and uses her arms to hug that leg while being engrossed in the movie. I walk along her long leg, noting how many of the freckles and blotches on them are bigger than my body. I soon make it past her denim shorts and soon I'm right beside her and craning my head all the way back to look up at her. She seems so close and all enveloping to me but in comparison to my size, her head is probably about half a mile above.

"K-Kayla down here! Please look down!" I yell up at her with my hands cuffed over my mouth to get louder but the volume of the TV is just too loud. Even if the room was dead silent would she even be able to hear my tiny voice?

Kayla continues to watch the TV without looking down. Even if she did glance down, it's highly unlikely she would be able to decipher me from being a piece of lint or some kind of tiny bug. I need to get her to feel me to examine me closer or even just get closer to her eyes. I could go to her bare legs and try to pound on them until she notices me but if she reacts by scratching or mistakes me for a flea trying to suck her blood, I would be crushed into paste before she could get a second look. The only option I have is climbing her. The denim material of her shorts have many grooves that I can fit my hands in between like an easy rock wall.

I walk closer to Kayla's now gigantic posterior seated on the floor. I needed to start climbing soon, if she adjusted her seating position just slightly, I would be smothered under her weight. I grab at the material and start the long climb. It takes almost an hour of climbing until I reach her waistband right near one of her belt loops and I still have so much more climbing to do.

As I'm about to reach up to continue climbing, the sound of a generic phone ring is so loud that my ears are screaming. Kayla lifts up her cellphone that was on the other side of her body and from my angle I can see that it says "Mom" for the caller ID.

"Pause it, it's my mom." Kayla demands as she pushes the touchscreen "Talk" button.

Cindy pulls out the remote and pauses the TV, while Kayla puts the phone to her ear. It's now quiet enough in the room to where you can hear the words of her mother.

"Hello?" Kayla says.

"Kayla where are you at?" An older woman's voice inquires.

"At Cindy's house watching a movie."

"Okay, I need you to get home now. It's getting late."

"Can I at least finish this movie?"

"Now." The mother repeats.

"Okay, Mom."

Kayla hangs up the phone. "I have to go now, I'll see you tomorrow."

"That sucks", Cindy replies. "See ya."

I should've found a way to get down off of Kayla's shorts but I'm so high in the air and it took me so long to get up here it would've been impossible anyways. Now I'm holding off for dear life as Kayla stands up to full height and slips on her flats before beginning her walk to her house. Each step she takes creates an impact of energy that moves up her leg and threatens to dislodge me to a deadly fall but I manage to keep hold. I just need to last until she gets home and she lives on the same street, just all the way down. Kayla walks outside, which is lit by the sunset and street lights. I've never been to Kayla's house and no nothing about her family. She only moved here a year ago with her and Cindy becoming friends shortly after but I've been so busy at work since I finished high school a few years ago that I never had the time to know her. I was only just starting to get consistent two days off in a row until this shit happened. What a quality way to spend it.

Cindy walks down the sidewalk and up her driveway to go through her front door in a completely foreign home to me. I'm sure her family will help me but it's unsettling to rely on relative strangers now that my house is hundreds of miles away.

Walking through her living room, I catch glimpse of a woman that looks very similar to Kayla except way older with a curvy and thick body type. She sat on the couch with her back resting on the arm rest and her legs and feet outstretched on the lap of a brunette man with a thick beard. Both of them lounged watching TV, barely acknowledging Kayla walked in as she continued down the hallway and turned to a bedroom.

The room was what I would expect from any preteen. A transitioning from little girl with the dusty dollhouse in the corner of her room to teen with the boy band posters everywhere. I expect the girl to go to her bed and can only hope she doesn't lay her side that I'm on. Instead, I watch her hands brush past me to the front of her shorts. A loud zipping sound echoes through the air and then the feeling of free fall occurs as I hold on to the shorts tightly. Looking up, I see Kayla is now only in her teal panties as I'm on the crumpled up shorts. The giantess then takes off her shirt to reveal her flat chest before tossing it on the ground. Her enormous feet move up past me as she walks to her dresser in the distance to pull out grey sweatpants and a white tank top and slips them on before grabbing her mini laptop laying on top of the dresser as well and then walks to her bed. The bed creaks and moans under the girl's weight as she lays on her stomach and browses the web while I watch from her discarded shorts.

There is no way I can reach her. The gap under the bed is too vast and there is nothing like sheets or anything touching the floor that I could climb to get up there. I'm so close to Kayla yet there is nothing I can do to get her attention. I could wait until she gets off the bed but that would be useless as she would only walk somewhere, giving me no time to get her help and it would likely result in me getting stepped on anyways. I will need to go elsewhere.

The noises and earthquakes stop as I figure it must be someone going to the bathroom. And here I am still in the same predicament. I see another thing moving in the other direction, a beetle that is longer than a bus and bigger than four of the ants side to side is walking about as well!

I crouch in a ball as various bugs stroll by without noticing me, feasting on the crumbs left on the floor or each other. Thankfully, I'm so tiny they don't notice me or figure I'm not worth the trouble. It's a long night that I barely get any sleep.

I nod off and then when I open my eyes, the kitchen is dimly lit. The morning sun shining through the windows. Looking around, crumbs are still everywhere but no bugs to be seen. I let out a sigh of relief, glad to have survived the night. A banging noise is heard in the background and the sounds of footfalls follows. Mom's feet crush crumbs into literal dust as she walks to the cabinet far away to the other side of the kitchen. Her full body visible again as she grabs a bowl, a spoon and then proceeds to the fridge for milk and a box of cereal above. I'll just stay right here where it's safe.

"No. We have to go right now."

"Coming!"

More footfalls and Cindy trots through the hallway wearing a black t-shirt with jeans and pink converses. The two walk through the front door leaving me in the house alone. The last major noise is the sound of the roar of the car engine before they drive off, leaving only the sounds of natural creaking and settling of the house.

Now I'm alone again but could I really survive sixteen or more hours until someone gets home? Especially with no humans around and the kitchen floor still a mess, bugs might show up again. There is no way I can stay here. I have to...
13322.title: Stay safe.

133221.content:
What else can I do besides try this phone again? I don't think I can survive in this house for long and getting help from the neighbors would require a travel that could take days. I pull the phone out my pocket and my eyes widen. I have the faintest of signals! I don't want to move at all to ruin it. I open up the contact list and before I make a call I realize I have to choose carefully. Emergency services wouldn't believe me, same with Mom and Cindy to where they would leave work or school to come home. Same thing with most of my friends but there is one person. Jess.

Every guy knows Jess. She's a slutty nineteen year old who lives two houses down from me. Of course she won't believe me either but I can easily convince her to at least come to the porch and then get her to look down at me. I've been friends with her for awhile and she's been trying to aggressively hook up with me but I always denied her advances due to having a girlfriend in the past and now recently even without one because of my dignity. Now I need her help.

With that I press the call button.

After the second ring. "Hello?" Says Jess's tired voice, she must've just woke up.

"Jess, I need you to come to my porch I can't really explain right now."

"Dan? Is that you? You're breaking up really bad, I can't make out what you said."

"Come to my house! I'll explain later!"

"Come to your house? Like now?"

I think for a second. It'll take me about thirty minutes to reach the porch.

"Thirty minutes! Come to my house in thirty-"

My signal cuts out. I have to get to that porch now! I start the trek through the kitchen. Quickly walking around boulder sized crumbs and over powdery dust of the crumbs my mom and sister crushed. Walking through the living room for the better majority of the thirty minutes I make it to the foyer area in front of the front door. Walking past a large pair of Cindy's brown sandals, I go under the front door. The gap is smaller than that of the bedroom doors but still more than small enough to go through for me.

I am introduces to blinding sunlight and a breeze that threatens to whisk me away. I am now on the porch and on top of the welcome mat caked in mud and dirt. I walk forward to get off of it and onto cement. That's when I see her. Coming up my driveway miles in the distance is a young woman with short blonde hair, wearing a black tank top that barely held her oversized breasts and revealed her flat stomach. Her shorts may as well have been denim panties and looking down her long legs I could see her thin-soled tan sandals with a black thong strap. She had a gold piercing on her nose and stomach and a black tribal tattoo extending from her left upper thigh to her knee and the top of her right foot had a rose tattoo.

I look at my phone and see I have a signal again! I get to her number on the contacts list and press the call button. Jess is walking up the steps of the porch. By now her footfalls create the menacing earthquakes and the thunderous boom from impact. Jess walks up the steps and I am left watching her in full height as she picks up her phone. As she puts it to her ear her foot positioned a few hundred feet forward of me is about to lift up, meaning it will travel another few hundred feet to crush me flat!

"Dan?" Jess answers, her voice echoing in real time and her voice in the phone making a metallic distortion of her.

"STOP!"

Jess stops in her tracks.

"What?" Jess asks with a confused look.

Looking at her frozen still for a brief few seconds. I can tell she looks moist as if she just took a shower. The smell of her berry scented soap mixed with cheap perfume permeates the air. She believes I invited her over to fuck. I will owe her anything she wants after this. Even with her wearing a pair of very thin soled sandals, they are still several stories in height to me. I'll have to get her to look down at me.

"Look down in front of you!" I tell her on the phone.

"What you're breaking up again?"

"Look down in front of you!" I say again.

Jess looks down right at me with her brown eyes. I wave my arms at her. "Down here! Do you see me!"

"What are you talking about, Dan? Are you going to let me in or what?"

She can't see me, she needs to get down closer.

"Jess, squat down and look at me closer!"

Jess lets out a sigh. "Fuck this, wasting my time."

With that she hangs up the phone and turns around leaving me feeling hopeless. I try to run after her but she is already off the porch going down the first step when her phone drops from her hand. She curses under her breath and bends down to pick up the phone. I sprint full speed to reach the edge of the porch just as she picks up her phone and starts to wipe off the dirt from it. Looking down off the edge of the porch I see my ticket out of here. Her foot just below me. Of course it's hundreds of feet down but maybe her skin can absorb the impact. This isn't a choice either way, it's either do this or die alone in the house. I jump before she can walk away!

Air whooshes around my ears as her foot nears until I land with a hard impact on top of her rose tattoo. The impact is so intense that even Jess feels it and looks down but dismisses it when she sees nothing. The wind is knocked from my lungs and my body stings with a searing pain but before I get a chance to recover, G-force impose their will upon my body as Jess lifts her foot up to begin walking. Before she puts her foot down to complete the step, I quickly grab onto small blonde hairs that are as thick as shoe strings and then negative g-forces attempt to lift me off her foot until it smacks onto the ground. This continues for several minutes as Jess walks to her house. Completely unaware of her tiny passenger.

After throwing up several times and nearly losing grip, I start to gain the ability to somewhat think of my predicament. I appear to be on the way to Jess's house. I've never been in there but I know she lives with her mom who is just an older version of her in terms of looks and sluttiness. I should've just got my family's attention last night when I had the chance...

Jess walks through the front door to go to...
133221.title: Try to use this damn phone again.

1332211.content: Jess stomped her feet up the stairs and was completely unaware that I was hanging on for my life on her foot. It was getting harder and harder to hang on as I tried to scream for her but she could not hear me. Finally as she was about to walk into her room I lost my grip and fell off just as I saw the sole of her sandal drift off into her room as she shut the door. I pondered if I should go into her room and try to get her attention again or was it just no use. Here I stand two houses away from my house inside the neighbor's house the size a small ant. I heard some noises that startled me but had no idea what they were and nothing was coming so I figured I was safe. As I sat down to try to collect myself and figure out my next move Tremors started to surround me. A loud humming sound started to get louder and louder which sounded like a freight train and then a wind started sucking all over like a tornado. It was Jess's mother and she was vacuuming the hallway, pushing the gigantic machine right towards me. I got up to run but the machine roll right over me and sucked me in. She then turned it off, wrapped it up and put it away leaving me in the dust of mess in darkness. I spent about a day and a half inside the chambers of the vacuum cleaner, until her mother started vacuuming again. Everything inside blew around as my world shook violently inside. New crumbs and new debris join me and quickly buried me inside. It eventually stopped and Light finally came in and Blinded Me. She was emptying all of the Dust into the garbage to throw it away. But as fate would have it as I was falling out, Jess accidentally bumped into her mother while on her cell phone and me and some of the Dust landed on the ground, hard. I thought my tailbone was broken that I had just enough strength to get up and out of the way before Jess's mother swept me up into the dustpan, as she did the other dust that fell out with me. She then stomped away with the garbage bag and threw it out. Finally safe, I had to figure a way out of here. As I stopped to take my breath Tremors appeared All Around Me Again. I turned around to see a giant pair of barefeet stomping towards me and then stopping right in front of me. Ten huge toes slightly wiggled and shook the ground. I looked up to see the face of Jess's eight year old brother Owen looking down at me, smiling. "Well, well, well what do we have here?"said Owen. I tried to scream to him but he cut me off "looks like a little bug who shouldn't be in this house." I tried to scream again for him to know that I'm not a bug that it's me Dan the boy who lives two houses down, his sister's friend! But he responded with, "well looks like today is the last day you get to live!" I screamed no you don't understand up to him...as he then lifted his giant foot into the air showing me the entire sole of the his huge barefoot and wiggled his giant toes as he laughed at me! Owen then said "it's time to play splat! Goodbye little bug! I'm the Giant and I've decided your time is up!" He then slammed his barefoot down on top of me, completely splattering me beneath it. He held his foot firmly on the ground for 60 seconds before lifting it up, turning it over and looking at my squished remains within the wrinkles on the sole of his foot. He smiled and felt good that he destroyed a little bug that he knew his mother would not want to the house.
1332211.title: Her room.

1332212.content: As Jess enters the kitchen she trips and sends me flying into the air. I end up Landing in a giant pool. But I'm confused as the water is all white and it is filled with giant brown squares. As I reach for one of the squares I realize they were a bit sticky. Smell of cinnamon fills the air and I taste my hand, and it is the flavor of cinnamon. I wonder I thought to myself as I put my head down and took a sip of the White Water. I was right this was milk. Then I realized where I was, I was in a gigantic bowl of cereal. And this cereal was Cinnamon Toast Crunch. Just then I realized the danger I was in. At my size I will get eaten and never noticed. I tried to scream as Jess was nowhere in sight. Just then a loud commotion happened around outside of the cereal bowl. I looked up just to see a huge shiny metal object dive into the bowl. It was a larger-than-life spoon as it scooped up a lot of the cereal and brought it up to a giant mouth that devoured it. I heard a loud dangerous crunching as the spoon descended back into the bowl nearly scooping me up. As another load was successfully scooped, the spoon hovered in the air for a bit as the giant finished chewing. At this time I got a look at the Giant who was about to make me it's breakfast, it was Owen, Jess's little 8 year old brother!! I tried to scream up but he then ate the next spoonful crunching away and enjoying the cereal. He had no idea that a super tiny person was swimming for his life in the cereal. He then carelessly put the spoon back into the cereal, scooping up a huge load of Cinnamon Toast Crunch, and unfortunately me as well!! The air rushed by me as he quickly brought the spoon to his open mouth!! I tried to scream for Jess to help me but she left the house already, so she will do nothing to prevent her brother from eating me!! I screamed Owen's name and begged for him not to eat me but I went right into his mouth as his lips slammed shut around the spoon. The spoon pulled out of his mouth, dumping me and all the cereal on his tongue. The tongue bounced me and the cereal around and started pushing me forcefully and abusively towards his giant molars. I heard nothing but squishing and crunching as I knew I would be next. The cereal was becoming mush all around me and the scent of nothing but cinnamon, milk and saliva filled my nostrils. I started being encased in chewed up cereal as his tongue then pulled me away from his molars. This is great I thought, I'm not getting chewed up as I tried to free myself from the big ball of mush that started cementing me in. But then I realized, but this is worse he's going to swallow me and I'll be alive. I screamed one last time as my scream was drownded out by a giant wet gulp!! I felt myself being process downward along with sticky saliva and mushed up cereal. I got to a point where there is no more oxygen and all I hear is gurgling and sloshing all around me. I was soon through his intestine and into his stomach where I started getting churned into a milky substance. Everything went black as I was completely digested inside of this young boy.
1332212.title: The kitchen (fall)

133222.content:
I pull out my phone to see if I have any signal but it's still nothing. I don't even have a wifi signal as the transmitter is too tiny to function properly. To make matters worst the phone is already at only twenty percent battery after leaving it on all night. I turn the phone off and let out a sigh. I'm going to have to leave this house. There is no I'm going to wait here alone just to be stuck with being unable to get help again.

Beyond the kitchen table and chairs I'm under is the sliding glass door leading to the backyard. I take the trek to it and find that the metal separator and tracking is like a tall wall to me but a piece of dead grass creates a sort of ramp for me to walk upwards on. I walk up this dry stalk of grass and then across another over more of the tracking like a bridge until walking along the top of the metal track to reach the end of the glass door where there is plenty of room more me to walk through like how a bug enters the house.

I'm now outside, the cool air of the morning makes me shiver but the sun's rays provide some warmth. I look across the bumpy cement patch to see vast jungles of grass surrounding. Beyond those jungles, very many miles away, I see monolithic houses. The chirping of birds echoes through the air and various clicking of insects as I already take note of some ants moving in the distance. If I can survive walking through this jungle, I know I have neighbors to the left and right and the back fence.

To the left is an older Asian woman who is in her fifties and by herself as her husband passed away some time ago. To my right is a black woman just a couple years older than me and her Hispanic female roommate. Through the back fence is a two storied house with a pool belonging to a white couple with an eight year old and eighteen year old daughter.

I decide to go to...
133222.title: Go outdoors.

1332221.content:
Knowing the layout of my backyard, I figured the house on the right was the best bet. It was by far the closest and, being roughly the size of a flea, I wanted as short a trek as possible. I’d have to get under the fence and into the neighbors’ backyard. From there, hopefully I could find a way in. With the journey mapped in my head, I began the trip across the concrete and into the forest of grass.

The next four and a half hours were downright brutal and painfully boring. What would have been a quick walk across the lawn was now a harrowing slog in the wilderness. I trudged through the dirt, occasionally made into a soft slurry by morning dew. From time to time, I’d have to dodge a massive droplet as it rolled off a towering blade of grass. I could tell morning was passing into noon as it became unbearably humid. It felt like I was wandering through the sweltering canopy of a vast rainforest. Covered in a mixture of sweat and dried mud, I groaned as I neared the fence. I was barely halfway there.

The terrain began to change after I passed under the wooden barrier, which seemed to stretch endlessly into the sky. The jungle of the lawn abruptly stopped, giving way to an even plain of black soil. Gargantuan clusters of vegetation were evenly spead throughout the flat landscape. My jaw hung slightly open as I gazed upward at the nearest one. A tomato plant. I'd wandered right into a vegetable garden.

A sudden, rhythmic thumping grabbed my attention. The ground began to quake as distant voices echoed above. I felt the blood drain from my face as the source of the tremors crashed into the ground just a few centimeters to my right. An unfathomably large, white tennis shoe. The impact of the enormous sneaker knocked me flat on my back. The largest living being I'd ever seen loomed above. My African American neighbor's hair was back in a ponytail. She wore a pink t-shirt, which was fairly tight around her torso. Charcoal gray yoga pants clung to her toned legs and rear. I couldn't say we were well-acquainted. She'd only been living next door for just a few months and I hadn't even gotten her name. With an athletic build at around 5'9, she was pretty tall. She used to be just pretty tall, anyway.

Before I could get my bearings, a second woman lumbered into view with a basket in hand. The Hispanic girl had joined her in the garden. She was on the shorter side, more thickly built than her roommate. I wouldn't say she was chubby but she definitely had some curves. I could tell even at normal size, her chest was significantly larger than average. Dark hair flowed well past her deeply tanned shoulders, which were bare except for the straps of a white tank-top. The shirt was cropped just above her navel, revealing where the waistband of black athletic shorts dug into soft flesh of her hips. Thick, silky thighs descended into round calves. Her simple, black flip flops thundered against the ground as she approached.

"I think they're ripe, Naomi." The shorter woman boomed as she began to crouch above you. The taller, apparently named Naomi, followed suit lowering her impossibly huge frame toward the ground. They were about to start picking tomatoes! Feeling like I'd finally caught a break, I decided to act quickly.

I climbed onto...
1332221.title: Into the Garden

choices: Am flung off the shoe string somewhere inside the house.
I manage to hold on to the shoestring through all the chaos.
13322211.content:
The only option that makes sense to me is climbing Naomi. The other giantess is seemingly miles away even though she is in reality just a couple feet away from the closest female. By the time I would get to her, she would probably be finished picking the tomatoes and walk away, leaving me behind. Another barrier that I cannot simply jump on to her flip flops. The thickness and height of the sole of the flip flops are probably well over a hundred feet compared to me! Naomi on the other hand is closer, and although climbing the sole of her shoe would be an ever greater impossibility than climbing the thin sole of a flip flop, that will not be a factor due to a loose shoe string that is thicker than several tree trunks combined in one. I just need to reach the shoe string and climb up!

Although Naomi is so close, a few centimeters at my flea size is a good forty yards away. Not wanting to waste this opportunity to escape the outdoors, I clock my legs into overdrive to sprint towards the godlike shoe. While I am sprinting, Naomi accidentally drops a tomato. The massive, red sphere that may as well be some kind of mini-moon collided with the ground with enough force to make me lose balance as the floor trembled and the uneven, moist soil lashed around like it was alive. I look in horror as the tomato rolls towards at a couple hundred miles per hour. This is how I die, getting crushed by a tomato.

Just as the tomato is upon me, it suddenly stops leaving me face to face with a wall of glistening red covered in blotches of dirt bigger than your body. The massive sphere starts to shift back to reveal five enormous fingers with a reflecting burgundy color painted onto their nails that are latching onto the tomato and lifting it up in the air with an impressive shoe of strength.

"Oops." Naomi's booming voice echoes through the air as she places the tomato in the basket and continues with the other tomatoes.

My heart still pumping from the near death ordeal, I continue sprinting forward. I did not have much time to reflect on what just happened, I need to get to this shoe string. The closer I get, the more I realize how tiny I am. This massive foot is big enough to flatten cities compared to me! I still cannot comprehend how insignificant I really am! Finally just in front of the loose shoestring, I latch onto the woven threads the shoe string is made of as if it is like climbing a wall of rope that extends hundreds of feet to get off the ground and to the top of the shoe, a harrowing and climb just to reach the top of her foot.

While, I am trying to climb, Naomi filled her basket and gets up to walk inside the house with the tomatoes. This creates havoc for me as I...
13322211.title: Shoelace Solace

choices: I managed to climb to the top of her foot.
133222112.content:
The world around me became a blur as the titanic sneaker began to lift into the air. I dug my hands deep into the treads, trying desperately not to be thrown off the shoelace. Wind ripped at my clothes as Naomi sent her foot hurtling forward in a colossal first step. An earth-shattering BOOM!! shook me to my core as the shoe collided with the ground, sinking heavily into the soft soil.

I was forced to cling to the shoestring with all my strength as she walked toward the house. Every step rocketed me miles forward, always ending in a thundering crash. By the time she passed through the sliding door my energy was almost totally sapped. I shivered, feeling the air-conditioning as Naomi obliviously carried me into the kitchen.

"I'll get started on the salad." She said to the other giantess. I heard the distant rush of running water. Looking skyward, I saw her rinsing tomatoes at the sink.

While she was standing still I...
133222112.title: Stowaway on a Sneaker

1332223.content:
The best bet for help is the house across the back fence. The only person I sort of know there is their daughter, and I don't really know her as much as I remember her being a freshman when I was a senior at high school. By now she has to be in her own senior year. The good thing about this family is there is more of them to get help from the bad is that they are the furthest away out of my choices. It could take me days to cross this forest.

I walk through the cement patch which in and of itself was almost two hours before I even reach the grass line with the stalks towering over me bigger than any tree I've ever seen. It completely obscured my view of anything in front of me but the one thing that did catch my eye is a tall aged dandelion with white seeds that resembled a tall radio tower. If I climb that, I can use it as a vantage point to see what direction to take so I can reach the house fast.

The dandelion has small hairs on it that are like vines for me to climb. I try my best not to look down especially as I start to pass the canopy of the tall grass. To make sure I have the best view, I continue all the way to the top, standing on the flowering dandelion. As I look at the back fence and try to think of the best route, a particularly strong breeze blows that feels more like a hurricane gale! The whole dandelion leans and I almost fall off so I have to grab one of the large dandelion seeds! Me grabbing the seed along with the force of the breeze, makes the seed break off and I am sent flying in the air holding on to the seed like a glider! If I let go, I'll surely fall to my death as I'm now miles above ground!

I can only helplessly watch as the seed floats towards...
1332223.title: Back/Forward through the jungle

13322232.content: I keep floating as I pass by somebody's yard and I see a bunch of swings getting closer and closer and closer. I'm now over the neighborhood park and I passed by a few empty swings as I start to float through a giant Pavilion filled with a lot of people. It was a family picnic as the breeze just picked up and pushed me faster amongst these Giants. A giant head of a middle-aged man almost crashed into me has I floated right by his ear. And then a elderly man walked right past me brushing me with his shoulder which sent me spinning backwards and Landing towards the picnic table. A woman reached for a bunch of things on the table as I hit her elbow and landed backwards falling off my seed, and Landing right in a pile of mush, which happened to be giant container of onion dip. I couldn't help but taste it as I tried to free myself. I screamed and screamed but first of all I realize I was too small for any of these people to hear me, second of all all these people were much too loud, especially a lot of kids screaming, which made it impossible for anyone to hear me even if they were listening for me. Then it happened, a huge chip scooped into the dip pushing more dip on top of me making me completely covered in it. As I wipe my eyes I saw the chip enter the mouth of an elderly man who ate it quickly and then another and another as he kept eating as if he never ate before. Then another chip came from a different direction as dip was scooped up and eaten by a middle-aged man. Another chip came in as an elderly woman chomped it. I kept having to dive and dive to avoid chip after chip, until finally a chip came in and scooped me right up. my heart sank to my stomach as I was being lifted quickly into the air, and was presented with a large huge giant face of a teenage boy. I screamed for him to hear me I screamed for him not to eat me, I waved my arms as much as I could, but he just shoved me into his mouth. He started to chew quickly as wet crunching surrounding me and I soon felt the pressure of his molars as they crushed me and grinded me along with the rest of the chip and dip. I was then forced by his tongue with my mangled body almost dead, to the back of his throat as he swallowed and I was sucked into the process of complete digestion.
13322232.title: The neighborhood park.

info.description:
Just a generic story, really nothing more or less. No underage sexual scenes like insertion but vore/crush allowed. Everything else with 18/older characters is allowed.

If chapters are short/very low quality, I reserve the right to edit them or delete if it's beyond saving.

You can change point of view if you want, but my adds will usually be done in 1st person.

Death encouraged for realism.

Don't just read it, let me know how I'm doing! I'm trying to add at least once a day.
